data.DescriptionHtml: This spell functions like summon desert ally I, except that you can summon one 3rd-level creature, 1d3 2nd-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures of the same kind.
data.Effect: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
data.Name: Summon Desert Ally Iii
